Class.name: SourceControl.xml.XMLFileFilter
Class.Description: This class filters out some elements of Cache's exported routines and globals.

Method.name: Filter
Method.Description: This method cleans an XML file, stripping attributes and tags related to timestamps and checksums. This must be done to avoid having lots of conflicts when updating. You must specify two files: source and target (target is always overiden)

Method.name: IsElementIgnored
Method.Description: This method tries to identifiy all elements that must be ignored

Method.name: ProcessExportElement
Method.Description: This method cleans the <Export> element of any ts attributes.

Method.name: ProcessProjectElement
Method.Description: This method cleans the <Project> element of any timestamp attributes.

Method.name: ProcessRoutineElement
Method.Description: This method cleans the <Routine> element of any timestamp attributes.

Method.name: ProcessSpecialElement
Method.Description: This method inserts a line break before the <Routine> element.

Method.name: ProcessGenericElement
Method.Description: This method just copies any element

Method.name: ProcessNonElementNode
Method.Description: This method just copies any node that is not related to an element

Method.name: IsCDataRequired
Method.Description: Caché's parser doesn't identify CDATA as CDATA (it shows it only as Chars). We must make sure a CDATA is really not required by listing all known CDATA element containers.
Method.Implementation: quit $case(elementName, "Routine":1, // MAC "Implementation":1, // MAC, CLS "Description":1, // CLS "Data":1, // (GBL) Globals :0)

Method.name: IsCDataFixRequired
Method.Description: Caché's parser incorrectly removes leading and trailing whitespecaes, whichi mey lead to syntax error. This method returns true if the element name requires a fix.
Method.Implementation: quit $case(elementName, "Routine":1, // MAC "Implementation":1, // MAC, CLS "Description":1, // CLS "Data":0, // (GBL) Globals - No. we // can't change a global! :0)
